level.text: There shall be no standing or parking of any vehicles at any of the location listed in this subsection.
From Park Road to Monroe Street, on the west side, “No Standing or Parking, 7:00a.m.-9:30a.m.; 4:00p.m.-6:30p.m., Monday-Friday.”.
There shall be no standing or parking of any vehicles at any of the locations listed in this subsection at the specified times.
From 30th Street to Thomas Jefferson Street on the north side, “No Standing or Parking, 7-9:30 A.M.: 4-6:30 P.M., Monday-Friday”.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 42 DCR 614,618 (January 27, 1995); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 47 DCR 1224 (February 25, 2000); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 47 DCR 3211 (May 5, 2000); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 50 DCR 4754 (June 13, 2003); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 55 DCR 6376 (June 6, 2008).
